0.2.name: wordpress/hello-wapuu
0.2.description:
WordPress Japanese official character "Wapuu" is plugin to speak a message on a dashboard. Only Japanese supports it now. In future versions, it is going to support the translation files.

Functions

  1. The current time is displayed on the dashboard.
  2. Last post date until now, how long, you know what the post has not been updated.
